This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Esc key does not count as user activation, so if it is the sole user interaction, that fires close but not cancel
PASS A keydown listener can prevent the Esc keypress from being interpreted as a close request
PASS A keyup listener can prevent the Esc keypress from being interpreted as a close request
PASS A keypress listener can prevent the Esc keypress from being interpreted as a close request
PASS close via synthesized Esc key must not work
Harness: the test ran to completion.
